Rewynder Website

Role: Web Designer

Duration: 6 months

Demo: Rewyndr Site

Overview

My role (part time) at Reywndr varied from bit to bit. The most of my deliverables were on the web front. I started out working as an Android developer, but the environment could not be set up, thus I moved towards doing web design prototypes towards my last few months.

Process

Through designing this website, I mainly focused on the companies main products and came up with all the technical writing as well. I also worked on a design for one of the products.
